series_description: This series documents over-the-counter ticket pack sales to retailers and players by regional customer service and Prize Zone offices, as well as large quantity ticket pack activations at a retail location, including amount of sale, check number, and seller. This series may include, but is not limited to: purchase request forms, approvals, receipts, invoices settlement reports, and daily logs of sales.

This series documents the performance of lottery game drawings, including numbers drawn, machines used, ball sets used, and names of officials and witnesses in attendance. It also documents electronic entry promotion drawings. This series may include, but is not limited to: second chance and promotional drawings.
retention_statement: 1 Year after end of calendar year

series_description: This series documents the payment of claims $600 or less presented to retailer or Lottery offices and the payment of promotional prize claims. This series may include, but is not limited to: original winner claim form, winning ticket, winning entries, promotion prizewinner validation forms, and systemgenerated check stubs.
retention_statement: 1 Year after end of state fiscal year

series_description: This series documents the payment of claims greater than presented to retailer or Lottery offices and the payment of promotional prize claims. This series may include, but is not limited to: Original winner claim form, winning ticket, winning entries, promotion prizewinner validation forms, and systemgenerated check stubs.
retention_statement: 7 Years after end of state fiscal year

series_description: This series documents the voluntary assignment of lottery payments. This series may include, but is not limited to: petitions and court orders to assign payments, assignment company and prizewinner documentation required under ยง 4020.1, correspondence, and records pertaining to annuity payments, bonds, initial prize claim, and tax withholding.

This series documents the expired or withdrawn application by retailer to order and sell lottery tickets. This series may but is not limited to: applications, tax documents, credit criminal background certification, surety bond, device agreements, and correspondence.

This series documents the denial/granting of an application to order and sell lottery products and the retailer-initiated cancellation, or the Lottery-termination of, an existing license order and sell lottery products. This series may include, but is not limited to: applications, tax documents, credit reports, criminal background certification, hearing notes/minutes, bond, device agreements, and correspondence.
This series documents the withholding of taxes from payments. This series may include, but is not limited to: and state tax withholding deposits.

This series documents the issuance of tickets to retailers (via sales representative) from a Lottery customer service location; the return of tickets from retailers to a Lottery customer service location (via sales representative); and the movement physically or virtually) of full, sellable packs of tickets between warehouses, sales reps, and retailers. This series may but is not limited to: returned tickets, transaction reports, missing/stolen pack reports, and vending machine reports.
retention_statement: 1 Year after end of state fiscal year

series_description: This series documents the verification of the specific lottery games and the packs of tickets of each game that Lottery representatives have in their possession. This series may include, but is not limited to: audits and reports.
retention_statement: 2 Years after end of state fiscal year

series_description: This series documents all ticket vending machine transactions operated at a Virginia Lottery office reported to accounting. series may include, but is not limited to: ticket inventory and deposits.
retention_statement: 3 Years after end of state fiscal year

series_description: This series documents individual subscriptions to the Virginia Lottery Subscription Games. This series may include, but is limited to: subscribers original applications, renewal forms, check copies, deposits, correspondence and reports.
retention_statement: 3 Years after end of state fiscal year
